content.webTitle: Her big day  Phar Breeze comes good

fields.headline: Her big day  Phar Breeze comes good
fields.bodyText: Phar Breeze put her best foot forward at Southwell yesterday to record the first win of her career, romping home by nine lengths in the Crandon Park Stud Mares Maiden Hurdle. The seven-year-old, who started at 6-1, often refused to race in the past but was always travelling sweetly under the amateur rider James Owen and, seen here taking the final flight, she won unchallenged from the well backed 2-1 favourite Hi Lily.
